[[inst_hl_lhip]]
==== HL.LHIP

*Syntax:* hl.lhip [SrcL, simm], ->Dst0, Dst1

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_lhip.svg[HL.LHIP encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA/PAIR
